    • Method Detail

      • getMetadataResolver

        protected org.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.AbstractReloadingMetadataProvider getMetadataResolver(String metadataFile)
                                                                                              throws org.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.MetadataProviderException
        Retrieve metadata in a file. The file is checked for updates periodically with an approximate refresh time between a minimum and a maximum time values.
        Specified by:
        getMetadataResolver in class AbstractSAMLIdPMetadata
        Parameters:
        metadataFile - Location of the metadata file.
        Returns:
        Resolver for the given metadata.
        Throws:
        org.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.MetadataProviderException - metadata provider exception
